qas.question: In what month of 2009 did VidZone start free service to some countries?

context: Since <a0_0><b5_0><b9_0>June<b9_0/><a0_0/> 2009<b5_0/> VidZone has offered a free music video streaming service in Europe, Australia and New Zealand. In <b6_0>October <a1_0>2009<b6_0/><a1_0/>, Sony Computer Entertainment and Netflix announced that the Netflix streaming service would also be available on PlayStation 3 in the United States. A <a2_0><b11_0>paid <b7_0>Netflix<b7_0/> subscription<b11_0/><a2_0/> was required for the service. The service became available in November <b10_0>2009<b10_0/>. Initially users had to use a free <a3_0><b12_0>Blu-ray<b12_0/><a3_0/> disc to access the service; however, in <a4_0><b13_0>October 2010<b13_0/><a4_0/> the requirement to use <b8_0>a disc<b8_0/> to gain access was removed.
